title: Log-in screen music
body:
This one is directly for anyone from Riot.

CAN YOU PLEASE NOT HAVE THE VOLUME FOR THE LOG-IN SCREEN SO DAMN LOUD :-P Thanks

I know its only a minor thing, but it is kinda annoying when you have your volume set to an appropriate level, then you hit the log-in screen and get your ear drums blown out.

.......and yes, I do realise that I could just disable the music, which is what I've done, but given that I actually like some of the recent music being used, it would be preferable that the volume just get toned down instead. (If this is something I can do myself and I haven't realised yet, then by all means, you can all call me an idiot, along with telling me how :-P)

replies.body: Log into the client, click the cog near the top right, adjust Music volume.
